pma:database.name: digivet
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `table_animal_diseases` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_animal` int(11) NOT NULL, `animal_type` text NOT NULL, `disease` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=47 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_general_question` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, `use_table` text NOT NULL, `disease` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=16 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_anthrax` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_black_leg` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_bovine_tuberculosis` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_brucellosis` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_cbpp` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_dehydration` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_foot_mouth` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_plastic_bag` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_pneumonia` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_ppr` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_rabies` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_tetanus` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `table_non_urgent_tickborne` ( `id_general_question` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` text NOT NULL, `audiofile` text NOT NULL, `symptom` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_general_question`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `variables_diseases` ( `PPR_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Plastic_bags_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Tetanus_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Tickborne_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Brucellosis_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Anthrax_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `CBPP_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Black_leg_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Foot_and_mouth_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Rabies_disease` int(11) NOT NULL, `Dehydration` int(11) NOT NULL, `Pneumonia` int(11) NOT NULL, `BovineTuberculosis` int(11) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `variables_general` ( `question_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `general_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `use_table` text NOT NULL, `kind_of_animal` text NOT NULL, `urgent` int(11) NOT NULL, `notUrgent` int(11) NOT NULL, `decision` int(11) NOT NULL, `id` int(11) NOT NULL, `first` int(11) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `variables_not_urgent` ( `wound` int(1) NOT NULL, `dropMilkProduction` int(1) NOT NULL, `rapidBreathing` int(1) NOT NULL, `lossCondition` int(1) NOT NULL, `trembling` int(1) NOT NULL, `swellingThigh` int(1) NOT NULL, `convulsions` int(1) NOT NULL, `abortion` int(1) NOT NULL, `stillborn` int(1) NOT NULL, `weakCalfBorn` int(1) NOT NULL, `retentionMembranes` int(1) NOT NULL, `fatigue` int(1) NOT NULL, `twitchingMuscles` int(1) NOT NULL, `anxiousAndEasilyExcited` int(1) NOT NULL, `bloat` int(1) NOT NULL, `diarrhea` int(1) NOT NULL, `drinkingLotsOfWater` int(1) NOT NULL, `insects` int(1) NOT NULL, `notEnoughFood` int(1) NOT NULL, `drinksLitte` int(1) NOT NULL, `swollenLymphNodes` int(1) NOT NULL, `alteredVocalisation` int(1) NOT NULL, `exaggeratedMovements` int(1) NOT NULL, `increaseSexualActivity` int(1) NOT NULL, `depression` int(1) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `variables_urgent` ( `fever` int(11) NOT NULL, `highTemperature` int(11) NOT NULL, `eyesInOrbid` int(11) NOT NULL, `extremelyThin` int(11) NOT NULL, `dropHead` int(11) NOT NULL, `isolatedFromHerd` int(11) NOT NULL, `weightLoss` int(11) NOT NULL, `unwillingnessToMove` int(11) NOT NULL, `appetiteLoss` int(11) NOT NULL, `quiveringLipsAndFrothingMouth` int(11) NOT NULL, `blistersTeath` int(11) NOT NULL, `lameness` int(11) NOT NULL, `difficultBreathing` int(11) NOT NULL, `suddenDeath` int(11) NOT NULL, `bloodFromOpeningsAfterDeath` int(11) NOT NULL, `collapse` int(11) NOT NULL, `infectionMembranes` int(11) NOT NULL, `swollenTesticles` int(11) NOT NULL, `protrudingEyelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `spasm` int(11) NOT NULL, `hardBallInStomach` int(11) NOT NULL, `cough` int(11) NOT NULL, `snot` int(11) NOT NULL, `aggressive` int(11) NOT NULL, `weirdNoises` int(11) NOT NULL, `limping` int(11) NOT NULL, `bleeding` int(11) NOT NULL, `difficultSwallowing` int(11) NOT NULL, `blistersMouth` int(11) NOT NULL, `blistersFeet` int(11) NOT NULL, `seizures` int(11) NOT NULL, `pinkMassEye` int(11) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
